thread.section_title: ShopTo.Net Reviews | Read Customer Service Reviews of www.shopto.net
thread.title: Lydia

author: Lydia
title: Lydia
text: I have been using Shopto for a number of years now, and my honest opinion is that they have always been very reliable. Their excellent service include taking a photo of your parcel and having it available to view from your account. In my opinion, this gives customers great confidence about their items dispatching on time and arriving properly. Their delivery is also super quick; for example, I bought Horizon: Zero Dawn (PS4) at around 4pm on a Wednesday, and it arrived at 9am the next day. With pre-orders, sometimes you also get lucky and the game arrive one day ahead of schedule. I was the envy of my friends, for example, when my copy of Mass Effect: Andromeda arrived a day early thanks to Shopto. The only time I don't use this site is when other shops provide a more competitive price, but that's about it!
